column2: and them already experience steakhouses and italian
column3: we wanted something different for this dinner and landed at Ba-Ba-Reeba! Our night didn't start out on a positive note
column4: right after we ordered and were chatting
column5: our table split in half... yep
column6: you heard right... broke down the middle just missing our guest's toes (one in sandals). Miraculously
column7: no one was hurt and we all recognized a once in a lifetime freak accident. Their tables are thick wood. This was the binding done in manufacturing that failed! Restaurants first concern was if anyone was hurt
column9: and took care of the bill and dry cleaning for one of the guests. So they did the right thing!
